mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( typ, seq, title, ctnt, i_user ) SELECT #{typ}, IFNULL(MAX(seq), 0) + 1, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{i_user} FROM t_board WHERE typ = #{typ}
mapper.select: SELECT A.i_board, A.seq, A.title, A.r_dt, A.hits , B.i_user, IFNULL(B.nm, '탈퇴회원') AS writer_nm, B.profile_img , IFNULL(C.favorite_cnt, 0) AS favorite_cnt FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i_board, COUNT(i_board) AS favorite_cnt FROM t_board_favorite GROUP BY i_board ) C ON A.i_board = C.i_board WHERE A.typ = #{typ} ORDER BY seq DESC
